chapter.title: Printer information
chapter.para: Invoke an available destination's info() method returns an &ns;::cups::destination object that provides additional information about the printer:

listitem.para: The destination's supported() and suppported_options() methods describe the printer's options and capabilities.
option_values(), default_option_values(), and ready_option_values() methods provide the possible values for the printer's options, their default values, and their currently available values.
user_defaults() provide the default settings for this printer, specified by the user using the printer administration and configuration utility.
